title: How to give yourself a hypnotic suggestion - Quora

response.answer_text: Write out the suggestion ahead of time. Make it positive and to the point. If you have a particular issue you want to deal with, think of several suggestions that will help. Put yourself in a mild trance and repeat the suggestions a few times. Deepen the trance and repeat. Don’t try to go very deep before giving yourself the suggestions or you might go to sleep before you start.
